flawed_nl_solution:
If Jane got 60 points and lost 20 points then the total number of points she accumulated in all the rounds was 60+20 = <<60+20=70>>70 points.
If each round is awarded 10 points, then the number of rounds will be 70/10 = <<70/10=7>>7 rounds.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
